TopicTitle: Can settings.cfg be copied into a newer KSP version?

Articles.Content: Can my KSP 1.7.3 "settings.cfg" be saved and then used in a new install of KSP 1.8.1...without breaking anything?
Yes, without breaking anything. From a higher version to a lower one may not, although I think it would simply ignore the entries that are not known to it.

11 minutes ago, swjr-swis said:

Yes, without breaking anything. From a higher version to a lower one may not, although I think it would simply ignore the entries that are not known to it.

Excellent...that should make the entire transition to 1.8.1 a bit less...painful...but then, there's mods to look for .
Most likely yes- after all, that's what happens every time the game updates. It should automatically add any new settings options when you run the new version.
